result.name: pension-forecasting-project
result.notes: This Pension Forecasting data provides monthly volumes of the number of pension forecasts relating to the State Pension (SP) Forecasts services provided by DWP. It also provides the number of forecasts broken down by forecast type – Combined Pension Statement (CPS), Individual Pension Statement (IPS) or Real Time Pension Forecast (RTPF). Pension Forecasting data contains individual level information. It does not contain geographical or financial information.

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Pension Forecasting Project

extras.value: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/state-pension-forecasts    Not due to be released. Contains personal and sensitive data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
